Articles.Content: Every time I just use scroll I get randomly selected to kerbin, and I can\'t go back to my vessel, I have to go to tracking center, and then go to my vessel again, which is quite annoying because I\'ve confused it with a couple of orbiting probes and misshot my target.

Is it in the map view, if so then u must have pressed TAB by accident. Press it to scroll through the bodies and you will be focused on your vessel.

Good luck.
